author: Adam M.

review: I had some initial difficulties setting it up in my home network. I even tried calling Google support and they responded but giving few suggestions. But it did not work. The device seem to be dependent on the router being used, so google did not have a apt suggestion for the model i had with me (i have cisco linksys E2000 model router). I found a video blog in the net based on which i changed few router settings. I then restarted everything in my house including the router and i was finally able to set it up. Chromecast is really cool for the amount you spend on it. You can stream from your laptop or smart phones if you have netflix and youtube app (it works wth pandora too but i don have pandorawith me). You can then multitask ur device but the video wll still be playing in ur TV. You can also stream video from chrome browser from your laptop but you might at times experiece a delay. Also, multi tasking ability is limited if you are streamingfrom your chromebrowser. Google isaware of it and are working on a fix. Overall, I am kind of satisfied with the product as of now and expecting more updates from google I am giving it a 4 star especially for the value for money it offers. Cheers!!!
